DOC.criteria: 1 . Males females 6085 year age . 2 . Good general health concomitant disease , would expect interfere study 3 . BMI range 2035 kg/m2 1 . Presence central neurological disease potential impair cognition ( e.g. , brain tumor , stroke , epilepsy , motor neuron disease , multiple sclerosis , Alzheimer disease , Parkinson 's disease ) prior major head trauma loss consciousness 2 . Presence active unstable lifethreatening systemic illness ( e.g. , cancer ) 3 . Presence major psychiatric disorder within past 3 year include depression , anxiety , alcohol ( 3 drink per day total 18 per week ) drug abuse ( DSMIV criterion ; Geriatric Depression Score > 6 ) 4 . Presence diabetes mellitus ( defined clinical diagnosis use antidiabetic agent ) metabolic syndrome 5 . Use psychoactive investigational medication 6 . Subjects MRI contraindication pacemaker , aneurysm clip , artificial heart valve , metal fragment , foreign object claustrophobia . All subject subject receive structural MRI part study .
